verses.text: \w This|strong="H1697"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amittai:

‘\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w preach|strong="H7121"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \w is|strong="H5892"\w* known \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w started|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w flee|strong="H1272"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Joppa|strong="H3305"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ship \w going|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w*. \w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w paid|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fare|strong="H7939"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* aboard \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* furious \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* blow \w over|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w such|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w storm|strong="H5591"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ship \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* danger \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w breaking|strong="H7665"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w sailors|strong="H4419"\w* \w were|strong="H3627"\w* terrified \w and|strong="H3381"\w* each \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* help \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* own god. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w threw|strong="H2904"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ship|strong="H5600"\w*’s \w cargo|strong="H3627"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w make|strong="H7043"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ship|strong="H5600"\w* \w lighter|strong="H7043"\w*. Meanwhile \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w had|strong="H3124"\w* \w gone|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* bottom \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ship|strong="H5600"\w* \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* fast \w asleep|strong="H7290"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7121"\w* \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H7227"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* ship \w went|strong="H7126"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, ‘\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7290"\w*? \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H6965"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w god|strong="H3808"\w*; perhaps \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w god|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w think|strong="H6245"\w* \w of|strong="H7227"\w* \w us|strong="H7121"\w*, \w so|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* lost.’

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* sailors said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w one|strong="H2063"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, ‘\w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w let|strong="H3212"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* discover \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w whose|strong="H4310"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.’ \w So|strong="H2063"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* indicated \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w*.

\w So|strong="H2088"\w* \w they|strong="H4100"\w* said \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*, ‘\w Are|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* blame \w for|strong="H7451"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*? \w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w your|strong="H4994"\w* \w business|strong="H4399"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w* \w from|strong="H7451"\w*? \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w your|strong="H4994"\w* country \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* belong?’

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* replied, ‘\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* worshipper \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w dry|strong="H3004"\w* \w land|strong="H3004"\w*.’

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w greatly|strong="H1419"\w* \w frightened|strong="H3372"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*?’ \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w fleeing|strong="H1272"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w calm|strong="H8367"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*?’ \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w grew|strong="H1980"\w* \w more|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w more|strong="H3588"\w* \w stormy|strong="H5590"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, ‘\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w throw|strong="H2904"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w will|strong="H7945"\w* \w be|strong="H3220"\w* \w calm|strong="H8367"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* fierce \w storm|strong="H5591"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* overtaken \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w instead|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H1980"\w* \w rowed|strong="H2864"\w* \w hard|strong="H2864"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w get|strong="H1980"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H3004"\w*; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w however|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w grew|strong="H1980"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w stormy|strong="H5590"\w* ahead.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, ‘\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w beg|strong="H4994"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w beg|strong="H4994"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, don’t \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* die \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w*’s \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* don’t \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* guilty \w of|strong="H3068"\w* shedding \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w pleases|strong="H2654"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.’

\w And|strong="H5975"\w* \w they|strong="H5375"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w threw|strong="H2904"\w* \w him|strong="H5975"\w* \w into|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*; \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* became calm.

\w Then|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w* \w greatly|strong="H1419"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w offered|strong="H2076"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H5087"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3372"\w*.
But the \nd Lord\nd* arranged for \w a|strong="H3068"\w* great fish to swallow Jonah, and Jonah was inside the fish three days and three nights. Jonah’s song
